name: Medicare Provider Analysis and Review (MedPAR) Outcomes Files
description: The files contain hospital admission records for Medicare beneficiaries, filtered and tagged based on a list of ICD diagnosis codes provided by researchers.

license.name: No license, user must be under Data User Agreement (DUA)

content.admission_date: Timestamp[us]: Admission date of the beneficiary
content.discharge_date: Timestamp[us]: Discharge date of the beneficiary
content.outcome: String: Outcome flag indicating the diagnosis associated with the hospital admission
content.outcome_criteria: String: Defines the rule used to evaluate ICD codes for admissions.`all`considers all available diagnosis codes for the admission and `first_n`considers only a specified number of diagnosis codes (e.g., the first 5) when determining whether the admission meets the outcome criteria
content.outcome_index: Int64: Sequential index of the outcome events for the beneficiaries
